`locCSN` is a package that calculates gene networks for each cell from single-cell datasets.
![pipeline](./Figures/Workflow_new.png)

How to cite `locCSN`
-------------------
This work has not published yet, please see [bioRxiv](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.02.13.431104v1).


Installation
------------

```python
pip install locCSN
```
Source code are stored in [Python Folder](https://github.com/xuranw/locCSN/tree/main/Python). 

More Information
-----------------
Please see [Tutorial](http://xuranw.github.io/locCSN/vignettes.html).
